priority_ranking.reasoning: Highest rating (4.9★) with strong review volume (76). Electricians are high-intent searchers - people need them NOW. Premium service quality (4.9) suggests high-value clients who appreciate investment in business growth. Perfect candidate.
priority_ranking.why_need_website: Emergency electrical work is 70% searched on mobile. Without a website, you're invisible to homeowners Googling 'electrician near me' at 9pm when a breaker trips. Your 4.9 stars should be working 24/7 - not hidden.
priority_ranking.best_contact_time: Tuesday-Thursday, 8:30-10:00 AM (after morning dispatch, before field work intensifies)

priority_ranking.reasoning: Tied for highest rating (4.9★), solid review base (68). HVAC is highly seasonal and competitive - spring/summer AC repairs are high-value. 'Energy Solutions' suggests modern, efficiency-focused positioning that needs digital presence.
priority_ranking.why_need_website: HVAC customers compare multiple quotes online before calling. Peak season is coming (spring AC check-ups). Right now, every competitor with a website is getting leads you're missing. Your 4.9 rating needs to be on Google's first page.
priority_ranking.best_contact_time: Monday-Wednesday, 4:00-5:30 PM (after service calls, before evening estimates)
priority_ranking.red_flags: None - timing is perfect with spring approaching

priority_ranking.reasoning: Highest review count (92) = most established. 'Anytime' branding implies 24/7 emergency service - CRITICAL need for online visibility. Strong 4.8★ rating. Emergency plumbing is pure mobile search behavior.
priority_ranking.why_need_website: Your name literally says 'Anytime' but you're invisible when customers search at 2am with a flooded basement. Emergency plumbing searches are 85% mobile. You're losing high-value emergency calls to competitors with websites every single day.
priority_ranking.best_contact_time: Early morning (6:00-7:00 AM) - catch them before emergency calls start
priority_ranking.red_flags: May be very busy (high review volume) - emphasize ROI and passive lead generation

priority_ranking.reasoning: Solid 4.7★ rating with good review volume (58). Established business. Good prospect but slightly behind other electrician (Keno) in ratings and reviews. Still strong conversion potential.
priority_ranking.why_need_website: You're competing with electricians who show up first on Google. 58 great reviews are worthless if customers can't find them. A website turns your reputation into 24/7 marketing that books appointments while you sleep.
priority_ranking.red_flags: Slightly lower rating than competitor Keno - may need to emphasize differentiation

priority_ranking.reasoning: Lowest rating (4.3★) and smallest review base (41) of the group. Still decent but may face objections. Dual service (plumbing + heating) offers opportunity for seasonal marketing angles.
priority_ranking.why_need_website: Plumbing and heating customers research before calling. Your 4.3 rating isn't bad, but without a website to tell your story and showcase your work, you're just a number. Let's turn those 41 reviews into a powerful first impression.
priority_ranking.red_flags: Lower rating may indicate service/follow-up issues - may be harder to close or have higher churn risk
